attributes.title: Solutions Engineer
attributes.description:
• 3+ years experience building production-ready Fullstack applications.
  • 3+ years experience with Node.js and React.
  • 2+ years experience with AWS serverless technologies (Lambda, DynamoDB, SQS, S3).
  • 2+ years experience with TypeScript.
  • 3+ years experience using git for source control.
  • 3+ years experience working in an Agile environment.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to diagnose and resolve complex technical issues.
  • Excellent communication skills, both technical and non-technical, for effective interaction with healthcare professionals and internal teams.
  • Ability to create big-picture software solutions.
  • Ability to present ideas in a clean, user-friendly way.
  • Fluency in English (C1) and excellent written and verbal communication skills.
attributes.projects:
OpenLoop is looking for a Solutions Engineer to join our team in Lima, Peru. This role will be a member of the Solutions Team.
About OpenLoop
OpenLoop was co-founded by CEO, Dr. Jon Lensing, and COO, Christian Williams, with the vision to bring healing anywhere. Our telehealth support solutions are thoughtfully designed to streamline and simplify go-to-market care delivery for companies offering meaningful virtual support to patients across an expansive array of specialties, in all 50 states.
Our Company Culture
We have a relatively flat organizational structure here at OpenLoop. Everyone is encouraged to bring ideas to the table and make things happen. This fits in well with our core values of Autonomy, Competence and Belonging, as we want everyone to feel empowered and supported to do their best work.
attributes.functions:
• Take complex screen designs and quickly render them into clean and well-organized code.
  • Create internal tools that enable our asynchronous team of engineers to work as efficiently and frictionlessly as possible.
  • Design and implement APIs that are consumed by our applications and our clients.
  • Contribute to an event-driven architecture that will power the future of our product line and service offering.
  • Play a key role in the development of Openloop integrations with third-party data platforms, CDPs, activation platforms, data warehouses, and other softwares our customers may need.
  • Work closely with external clients and internal business users to understand, translate and generalize their particular requirements and use cases in order to build applications.
attributes.benefits:
In addition to competitive salaries, this role includes:
  • Contract under a Peruvian company ID ("Planilla"). You will receive all the legal benefits in Peruvian soles (CTS, "Gratificaciones", etc).
  • Monday - Friday workdays, full time (9 am - 6 pm).
  • Unlimited vacation days.
  • EPS healthcare covered 100% with RIMAC ‚ÄîBecause you, too, deserve access to great healthcare.
  • AFP retirement plan ‚Äîto help you save for the future.
  • We will assign you a computer and other accessories so you can have the best tools to do your job.
  • You will have all the benefits of the Coworking space located in Lima - Miraflores (Free beverage, internal talks, bicycle parking, best view of the city).
attributes.desirable: • Experience working with Zoho and Healthie is considered a plus (desired).

attributes.title: Senior Database Administrator (Ms SQL)
attributes.description:
• Proficient in on-premises SQL Server management, with additional skills in Azure
  • Experienced in code tuning to optimize performance
  • Capable of conducting SQL code reviews and deploying changes
  • Skilled in managing backups and performing restores as needed
  • Able to provide support to developers for any database-related issues
  • Experienced in managing SQL server updates to ensure system stability and security
  • Knowledgeable in T-SQL replication for data synchronization
  • Possess strong troubleshooting skills to address technical issues efficiently.
  • Database user management and audit
  • B2+ English Level
  • Located in Chile
attributes.projects:
WE ARE

SoftServe is an IT company. We are advisors and providers who operate on the cutting edge of technology. With you, we set goals and reach them to grow better together, learning from both successes and mistakes. We are a team of thinkers and makers in more than 40 offices in 12 countries, true professionals and good people, who like what we do and do it well.

We hold top-level partnership statuses with all the major cloud providers and collaborate with many technology partners like Snowflake, Confluent, Cloudera, Starburst, Collibra, Tableau, among others.

Together with the SEI and Carnegie Mellon University, we adapted ADD and ATAM architecture design methodologies to Big Data needs and invented the Smart Decisions game to promote architecture design best practices in AI and Big Data.
attributes.functions:
• Master SQL Server and Azure Database Management: Bring your proficiency in on-premises SQL Server and Azure to enhance our database systems
  • Optimize and Review SQL Performance: Use your experience in code tuning and conducting SQL code reviews to optimize system performance
  • Lead Data Recovery and System Updates: Manage critical backups, restores, and SQL server updates to ensure system stability and security
  • Support Development Teams: Provide expert support to developers on database-related issues, helping to streamline project workflows
  • Troubleshoot and Audit Database Systems: Utilize your strong troubleshooting skills and oversee database user management and audits to maintain high operational standards
attributes.benefits: SoftServe es una empresa que ofrece igualdad de oportunidades. Pongamos tu talento y experiencia en movimiento con SoftServe.
attributes.desirable:
TOGETHER WE WILL

attributes.title: Customer Success Executive
attributes.description:
We are looking for an individual with high communication skills, goal-oriented, process-oriented, analytical, and thrives in a fast paced and demanding environment.Someone open to a culture of innovation and collaboration in an international team environment and is highly adaptable and quick to learn new information and implement new strategies. The ideal candidate is driven, self-motivated and enthusiastic with a ‚Äúcan-do‚Äù attitude and with the ability to work from home or in the office.To be successful in this position, you must be a team player, highly organized, and a problem-solver with the ability to educate/train users on new products or features with attention to detail.

What are we looking for?

  • University Degree.
  • Relevant customer success, customer service, or account management experience
  • Communications abilities in English+Spanish.
  • Technical aptitude and ability to learn software programs.
  • Proven track record of working in a customer-facing role.
  • Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite, (Outlook, Excel, PowerPoint and other)
attributes.projects:
We are a business intelligence platform, with 28 years of experience in the LATAM market, providing our clients with valuable and updated information on projects, news and data related to the areas of Electric Power, Infrastructure, Mining and Metals, Oil and Gas, ICT, among others, so that they can use this information to make strategic decisions for their business.
At BNamericas, our mission is to facilitate regional development and investment in Latin America by generating valuable business intelligence for companies, governments, and other market players worldwide while continually developing its people's expertise. You can find out more about us at www.bnamericas.com
We are ambitious, entrepreneurial, and innovators! Our team is expanding as our solutions gain market adoption.

*Hybrid work mode.
*This job has a salary + monthly commissions.
*This vacancy welcomes inclusive applications.
attributes.functions:
As a Customer Success Executive, you will work closely with C-Level Executives, Directors, and Regional Managers from diverse industries like Infrastructure, Mining, Electric Power, Oil & Gas, ICT, and Financial Services. Your objective is to drive usage up in every stage of the customer journey and ensure your assigned clients reach their goals.

  • Develop customer relationships that promote retention and loyalty, ultimately improving customer lifetime value and reducing churn.
  • Ensures all customers are successfully using the product or service they‚Äôve purchased from the company.
  • Serve as the primary contact for the onboarding of new customers, the training of platform endusers, and post-go-live support.
  • Ensure customers remain satisfied with the product by educating them about functional capabilities in line with their needs.
  • Manage Customer Success Activities like Training, Onboarding, Adoption, and support Renewals.
  • Identify and communicate potential risks that would threaten renewals and proactively drive action throughout the customer lifecycle to reduce churn.
  • This position reports to the Account Manager who will support your learning and development in the role.
attributes.benefits:
monthly commissions.
onboarding
continuous training and learning
excellent working environment
career commercial development
Start date: may 2024

  • El horario es flexible y no te pediremos horas extra, a menos que se est√© acabando el mundo y solo nosotros lo podamos solucionar.

attributes.projects:
HumanForest is a forward-thinking company that operates two innovative brands: Forest and AdMoai. Forest is a pioneering sustainable shared eBike operator in London. AdMoai is a cutting-edge white-label Ad Server solution that powers Forest's advertising ecosystem and other companies' ecosystems. We are a dynamic team of innovators, passionate about creating sustainable and tech-driven solutions.

We are looking for a dedicated and driven mobile developer who can assist us in expanding, enhancing, and achieving our ambitious growth goals. You will work closely with a multidisciplinary team of engineers, designers, and analysts. Reporting to the Head of Engineering and the Mobile Software Engineer Lead, your main responsibility will be to develop and maintain Forest's mobile application providing our valued customers with the best possible experience.

These are exciting times for this industry and HumanForest is leading the way with a renewed approach to micro-mobility solutions.

  • Learn the latest mobile technologies and standards to ensure we always use the best techniques possible.

attributes.projects:
We are a business intelligence platform, with 28 years of experience in the LATAM market, providing our clients with valuable and updated information on projects, news and data related to the areas of Electric Power, Infrastructure, Mining and Metals, Oil and Gas, ICT, among others, so that they can use this information to make strategic decisions for their business.
Our subscribers ‚Äì CEOs, project managers, and government officials ‚Äì turn to our content in search of sales leads and contracts, whether it‚Äôs to provide goods and services to major companies operating across the region or to compete for contracts in public tenders.
You can find out more about us at www.bnamericas.com
*This vacancy welcomes inclusive applications.
attributes.functions:
We're looking for a Mexico-based business reporter who can follow the money and the business opportunities in the local energy & oil sector.
Main responsabilities:
  • Produce exclusive content by talking to sources.
  • Contribute to in-depth reports about the Mexican market.
  • Develop industry sources that will allow you to consistently turn out content not found in general market outlets.
  • Make use of our exclusive project profile database to produce added-value content.
  • Occasionally brief clients on current market conditions.
